reviewText: Very nice music for my office.
Beautiful visuals, relaxing music. A unique blend for a calming experience.

This is a great video experience.  I have been looking for a relaxation video like this for a long time.  The songs are relaxing and the scenery changes throughout the video so I don't get bored while watching it as I have with other videos that have just one scene.  It is similar to a relaxation channel that I have seen for patients at the hospital where I work.  I always thought what a great idea it was and how I would like to have something similar at home.
